metadata.title: CVE-2017-9268 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the open build service before 201707022 the wipetrigger and rebuildactions checked the wrong project for permissions, allowing authenticatedusers to cause operations on projects where they did not have permissionsleading to denial of service (resource consumption).

criterions.comment: open-build-service: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
